entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023
